snippet: The fourth quarter was particularly poor, with pages dropping 8 percent when compared to the same period in 2010, according to figures from the Publishers Information Bureau.
abstract: The fourth quarter was particularly poor, with pages dropping 8 percent when compared to the same period in 2010, according to figures from the Publishers Information Bureau.

headline.main: Magazine Ad Pages Fell 3.1% in 2011, With a Weak End to the Year
